subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tom Kite set a United States Golf Association Open championship scoring record with a seven-under-par 28 on Thursday, but his 65 left him shy of the exalted air of the 59.
snippet: Tom Kite set a United States Golf Association Open championship scoring record with a seven-under-par 28 on Thursday, but his 65 left him shy of the exalted air of the 59.
